name: Final Frenzy
description: When the Action Phase starts: If the character to which this is attached is the active character, remove this status, heal this character for 3 HP, and re-attach Kamuna Talisman: Pyro.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase starts:</color> If the character to which this is attached is the active character, remove this status, heal this character for 3 HP, and re-attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C133031]</color>.
